title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 3714 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 17, 2010

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 3714




Statement by the Press Secretary
On Monday, May 17, 2010, the President signed into law:
H.R. 3714 - Daniel Pearl Freedom of the Press Act of 2009
